description.ko: 심해의 거대한 압력을 견디도록 설계된 최첨단 잠수정 아쿠아-5와 함께 최후의 개척지를 경험하세요. 칠흑 같은 심연을 밝히고 해저의 숨겨진 경이로움과 생물 발광의 신비를 드러내도록 제작되었습니다.
description.en: Experience the ultimate frontier with AQUA-5, a state-of-the-art submersible engineered for the crushing pressures of the deep ocean. Designed to illuminate the pitch-black abyss, it reveals the hidden wonders and bioluminescent mysteries of the sea floor.

prompt: A futuristic deep-sea exploration vessel named AQUA-5 navigating through the midnight zone of the ocean. The vessel has a sleek, pressure-resistant metallic hull with glowing blue LED strips. Surrounding it are bioluminescent jellyfish and strange deep-sea flora emitting soft neon lights. High-detail cinematic lighting, bubbles rising, dark abyss background, 8k resolution, hyper-realistic underwater textures.
